sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YETA3130 ( EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , MNRN_SQNO , DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , MNRN_NAME , MNRN_RSNO , MNRN_TYHU , MNRN_AREA , MNRN_ADDR , MNRN_STDT , MNRN_EDDT , MNRN_AMNT , MNRN_DUAM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #edacRvyy# , #settGbcd# , #mnrnSqno# , #dpobCd# , #systemkey# , #mnrnName# , #mnrnRsno# , #mnrnTyhu# , #mnrnArea# , #mnrnAddr# , #mnrnStdt# , #mnrnEddt# , #mnrnAmnt# , #mnrnDuam# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YETA3130 SET EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# , SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# , MNRN_SQNO=#mnrnSqno# , DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , MNRN_NAME=#mnrnName# , MNRN_RSNO=#mnrnRsno# , MNRN_TYHU=#mnrnTyhu# , MNRN_AREA=#mnrnArea# , MNRN_ADDR=#mnrnAddr# , MNRN_STDT=#mnrnStdt# , MNRN_EDDT=#mnrnEddt# , MNRN_AMNT=#mnrnAmnt# , MNRN_DUAM=#mnrnDuam# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND MNRN_SQNO=#mnrnSqno# AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YETA3130 WHERE EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND MNRN_SQNO=#mnrnSqno# AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

DELETE FROM YETA3130 WHERE EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.select: SELECT EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , MNRN_SQNO , DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , MNRN_NAME , MNRN_RSNO , MNRN_TYHU , MNRN_AREA , MNRN_ADDR , MNRN_STDT , MNRN_EDDT , MNRN_AMNT , MNRN_DUAM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YETA3130 WHERE EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND MNRN_SQNO=#mnrnSqno# AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , MNRN_SQNO , DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , MNRN_NAME , MNRN_RSNO , MNRN_TYHU , MNRN_AREA , MNRN_ADDR , MNRN_STDT , MNRN_EDDT , MNRN_AMNT , MNRN_DUAM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YETA3130 WHERE 1=1
EDAC_RVYY = #searchKeyword#
SETT_GBCD LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY EDAC_RVYY DESC , SETT_GBCD DESC , MNRN_SQNO DESC , DPOB_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YETA3130 WHERE 1=1
EDAC_RVYY = #searchKeyword#
SETT_GBCD LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
